mapper.select:
select count(le.emp_id) from lx_consumption le LEFT JOIN lx_emp lemp ON lemp.emp_id = le.emp_id
AND lemp.emp_mobile=#{phoneNumber}
AND lemp.emp_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyWords},'%')
AND lemp.emp_id like CONCAT('%',#{emp_id},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lx_consumption(lx_consumption_id, lx_consumption_cont, lx_consumption_count, lx_consumption_type, dateline, order_no, emp_id) VALUES (#{lx_consumption_id}, #{lx_consumption_cont}, #{lx_consumption_count}, #{lx_consumption_type}, #{dateline}, #{order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emp_id})
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*,lemp.emp_mobile as emp_mobile, lemp.emp_name as emp_name, lemp.emp_cover as emp_cover FROM lx_consumption sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp lemp ON lemp.emp_id = sn.emp_id where sn.lx_consumption_id=#{lx_consumption_id}
